comments.content:
I'm probably wrong about that after closer review. It's hard to say since the sample is small, and there are a bunch of fonts which fit fairly well.   
   
 [See for yourself](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052241/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/testdrive.html?s=CITi%2BCENTRE%2BPLAZA&p=60)

I don't think mine is right either, after a closer look. At least you have some choice for replacements now ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052241im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

More suggestions? Anyone? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052241im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Three different IDs in three minutes.. That has to be some kind of record.
I think DIN is the correct one. Compare the C, E and A in the candidates with the sample.
